```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(DT)
library(crosstalk)
```


```{r}
quake <- read_csv("flex/earthquakedata.csv")
```


# leaflet

##

### Tabla

```{r}
quake %>%
  filter(yr == 1995) %>%
  datatable()
```


### Mapa

```{r}
quake %>%
  filter(yr == 1995) %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(ln = ~lon,
             lat = ~lat,
             label = ~mag)
```


# Crosstalk

```{r}
shared_quake <- SharedData$new(quake %>% filter(yr > 2000))
```
